definition: abbr. for Ukraine 烏克蘭|乌克兰[Wu1 ke4 lan2]/surname Wu
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
Ürümqi or Urumqi prefecture level city and capital of Xinjiang Uighur autonomous region 新疆維吾爾自治區|新疆维吾尔自治区 in west China
Yiwu county level city in Jinhua 金華|金华[Jin1 hua2], Zhejiang

pinyin: Wu1 zi1 bie2 ke4 si1 tan3

definition: black dragon/unexpected mistake or mishap/own goal (soccer)/oolong (tea)/(Tw) (loanword from Japanese) udon
Ürümqi or Urumqi prefecture level city and capital of Xinjiang Uighur autonomous region 新疆維吾爾自治區|新疆维吾尔自治区[Xin1 jiang1 Wei2 wu2 er3 Zi4 zhi4 qu1] in west China
Yiwu county level city in Jinhua 金華|金华[Jin1 hua2], Zhejiang

sentences.english: A wooden passenger car was abandoned at back yard of Wu-Shu-Lin Depot.
sentences.chinese: 废弃于乌树林车库后方的糖铁木制客车。

sentences.english: He ordered Terni to go get his only son, Arius.
sentences.chinese: 玛德尼命令特尼找到他那唯一的儿子艾利乌。

sentences.english: In the rain, a 11)blackbird was singing beautifully.
sentences.chinese: 在雨中，一只乌鸫正在鸣唱，歌声优美动听。

sentences.english: In this paper, the effect of Osteopontin (OPN) gene on the Black Dahe pig reproductive performance was researched.
sentences.chinese: 研究了骨调素基因对大河乌猪繁殖性能的影响。

sentences.english: When Tou king of Hamath heard that David had defeated the whole army of Hadadezer, king of Zobah.
sentences.chinese: 哈马王陀乌听见大卫杀败琐巴王哈大利谢的全军。

sentences.english: And David said to Uriah, Go down to thy house, and wash thy feet.
sentences.chinese: 大卫对乌利亚说，你回家去，洗洗脚吧。

sentences.english: By Egyptian record, Keftiu was destroyed by the seas in an apocalypse.
sentences.chinese: 依照埃及人记载，克弗悌乌在一次天启中被海洋毁灭。

sentences.english: The eighth Wuhui was the short-ear Nadou'alou.
sentences.chinese: 第八个乌麾是短耳朵的那斗啊娄。

sentences.english: It is one of the best movies ever made in Hollywood.
sentences.chinese: 在好来乌，这是其中一个最好的电影了。

sentences.english: He expressed the hope that the friends from the media could continue to offer their attention and support to China-Uzbekistan friendly cause.
sentences.chinese: 希望乌新闻界朋友继续关心和支持中乌友好事业。

sentences.english: He refers to the story of David and Uriah.
sentences.chinese: 他讲的是大卫和乌利亚的故事。

sentences.english: Bathsheba He had Uriah killed so he could sleep with her.
sentences.chinese: 他杀了乌利亚然后占有了。

sentences.english: Traditional Chinese medicine Polygonum multiflorum has the function of hair blacking .
sentences.chinese: 传统中药何首乌具有乌须发的作用。

sentences.english: Two freight cars were abandoned at back yard of Wu-Shu-Lin Depot.
sentences.chinese: 废弃于乌树林车库后方的糖铁蓬车。

sentences.english: And when David had called him, he did eat and drink before him;
sentences.chinese: 大卫召了乌利亚来，叫他在自己面前吃喝，使他喝醉。

sentences.english: Arius, only two years old, drooled and gurgled.
sentences.chinese: 年仅两岁的艾利乌又叫又哭。

definition: to divine/to forecast or estimate/(of a place to live etc) to choose
abbr. for 青海[Qing1 hai3], Qinghai Province
Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

to long for/to wish/to cling to/to stick to/sth that sticks/close to/next to/spread open/informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4]/bar (unit of pressure)/nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail
Buddhist nun/(often used in phonetic spellings)
Montenegro, former Yugoslavia/Heishan county in Jinzhou 錦州|锦州, Liaoning
pool/pond/(of metals etc) luster/favor or beneficence/damp/moist
name of weed plant (fat hen, goosefoot, pigweed etc)/Chenopodium album
phonetic fei or fi/elegant/phi (Greek letter Φ, φ)
solemn/reverent/calm/burial position in an ancestral tomb (old)/old variant of 默
Mt Tai in Shandong/same as 泰山
used in place names, notably Kunlun Mountains 崑崙|昆仑[Kun1 lun2]/(also used for transliteration)
descendant/elder brother/a style of Chinese poetry
